special_powers.description: Cable can use Invulnerability. When Cable has less than 2 action tokens, he can use Energy Shield/Deflection.

Give Doop a power action and roll a d6 that can only be rerolled one per turn by removing a Headline Token from him. 1-2: Moving Between Panels - Place Doop and all adjacent characters into any square adjacent to themselves. 3-4: Doop Space - All characters within 4 squares are placed adjacent to Doop. 5: Gleaming The Cosmic Cube - Choose a friendly character and it can use the Power Cosmic team ability until your next turn. 6: Hailstorm Of Mjolnirs - Doop makes a range attack with a range value of 10, three lightning bolts and Improved Targeting: Adjacent. Instead of normal damage, each hit character and each character adjacent to one or more hit characters is dealt 3 damage.
Colossus can use Charge and Improved Movement: Destroy Blocking.

Cannonball can use Charge, Force Blast and Improved Movement: Destroy Blocking, Characters. When Cannonball moves 4 or more squares and only in a direct path, increase his attack and damage by +1 this turn.

Deadpool, Merc with a Mouth makes a range attack using [Improved Targeting: Characters, Hindering, Adjacent)], targeting each opposing character within range and line of fire. Each hit character is dealt 2 penetrating damage instead of normal damage. Deadpool, Merc with a Mouth can use Probability Control during this attack.
D.E.A.D.P.O.O.L. can't use the Carry ability. When D.E.A.D.P.O.O.L. makes a close attack and actions resolve, he may make a ranged attack with Improved Targeting: Adjacent.

special_powers.name: Yellow Dashed Line
special_powers.description: This line separates the two levels. A trap door needs to be used to move between the two levels.

special_powers.name: Orange Numbers
special_powers.description: These mark the trapdoors. Characters using trapdoors must enter and exit with a trapdoor with the same number.

special_powers.name: Open Air Terrain
special_powers.description: If a character that can't use Leap/Climb, Phasing/Teleport, Flight or Great Size occupies Open Air Terrain after actions resolve, deal that character 1 unavoidable damage and then the character's controller places the character in their starting area.
